definition: abbr. for Afghanistan 阿富汗[A1 fu4 han4]
prefix used before monosyllabic names, kinship terms etc to indicate familiarity/used in transliteration/also pr. [a4]
Buddhist nun/(often used in phonetic spellings)

sentences.english: Once he delivers the opium time, was not careful has overturned the ammonia.
sentences.chinese: 有一次他去送鴉片的時候，不小心打翻了阿摩尼亞。

sentences.english: Ammonia is used as a restorative when a person has fainted.
sentences.chinese: 一個人暈過去之後，阿摩尼亞可用作興奮劑。
